newsitem.title: UK: Banco Fibra adds $20 million to eight-year bond.
newsitem.headline: Banco Fibra adds $20 million to eight-year bond.

text.p: The following structured bond launched yesterday for $100 million, has been increased by $20 million, joint lead managers CS First Boston and Deutsche Morgan Grenfell said.
TYPE STRAIGHT ISS PRICE 99.79 PAY DATE 13.DEC.96
MOODY = LISTING LUX PAY FREQ SEMI-ANN
NEG PLG YES CRS DEFLT YES FORCE MAJ IPMA 2
GOV LAW ENGLISH HOME CTRY BRAZIL TAX PROVS STANDARD
NOTES **TO AN INVESTOR PUT OPTION AFTER THREE YEARS.
